data.text: Terrible things will happen to you judges who are unjust
You refuse to help poor people,
When I punish you
You will be able only to stumble along as you are taken away with other prisoners,
Yahweh says, “Terrible things will happen to Assyria.
Sometimes I send the armies of Assyria to attack a godless nation,
But the king of Assyria does not understand,
He says, ‘All of my army commanders will soon be kings of these nations that I conquer!
We destroyed Calno city like we destroyed Carchemish city,
We were able to destroy all those kingdoms that were full of idols,
So we will defeat Jerusalem and destroy the idols that are there,

But, I, Yahweh, say that after I have used Assyria to finish what I want to do to punish the people in Jerusalem [DOU], I will punish the king of Assyria because he has been very proud and arrogant/boastful [DOU].
He says, ‘By my own great power [MTY] I have done these things.
Like [MET] a farmer reaches into a bird’s nest to take away the eggs,
But I, Yahweh, say that an axe certainly cannot [RHQ] boast about being stronger than the person who uses it,
And I, the Commander of the armies of angels, will send a plague among the proud soldiers of Assyria;
I, Yahweh, who am like [MET] a light for the people of Israel, will be the fire;
There are glorious forests and fertile farmlands in Assyria, but I will completely destroy them;
There will be very few trees left in those forests;
In the future there will be only a few people left in Israel;
Those Israelis will return to their mighty God.
Now, the people of Israel are as numerous as the grains of sand on the seashore,
Yes, the Commander of the armies of angels has already decided to destroy the entire land of Israel.
This is what the Commander of the armies of angels says:
Soon I will no longer be angry with you,
The Commander of the armies of angels will whip them.
Some day, Yahweh will cause the army of Assyria to stop oppressing you, his people;
The army of Assyria will enter northern Judah near Aiath town,
They will cross through a mountain pass
You people of Gallim town will cry out for help.
The people of Madmenah town north of Jerusalem will all be running away,
The soldiers of Assyria will stop at Nob city outside Jerusalem.
But listen to this! The Commander of the armies of angels
He will destroy the soldiers of Assyria
